entry.title: Liz Thayer - Midwest Tumor Microenvironment Meeting 2018

entry.title: Travis Lantz - Virgil St. John Scholarship for your outstanding performance in Chemistry

link.title: Travis Lantz - Virgil St. John Scholarship for your outstanding performance in Chemistry

entry.content: Travis Lantz was awarded the Virgil St. John Scholarship for your outstanding performance in Chemistry by Dept. of Chemistry, Purdue University in 2018.
entry.summary: Travis Lantz was awarded the Virgil St. John Scholarship for your outstanding performance in Chemistry by Dept. of Chemistry, Purdue University in 2018.
